languages.text: [Вернуть подарок] "Соломон, зафиксируй попытку подкупа. Мне не нужны твои дары, Руолдо".

traits.locale_text: [Вернуть подарок] "Соломон, зафиксируй попытку подкупа. Мне не нужны твои дары, Руолдо".

languages.text: [Return the gift] "Solomorne, make a note of this attempted bribery. I have no need of your gifts, Ruoldo."
languages.original_text: [Вернуть подарок] "Соломон, зафиксируй попытку подкупа. Мне не нужны твои дары, Руолдо".

languages.text: [Das Geschenk zurückgeben] "Solomorne, vermerkt diesen Bestechungsversuch. Ich brauche Eure Geschenke nicht, Ruoldo."
languages.original_text: [Return the gift] "Solomorne, make a note of this attempted bribery. I have no need of your gifts, Ruoldo."

traits.locale_text: [Das Geschenk zurückgeben] "Solomorne, vermerkt diesen Bestechungsversuch. Ich brauche Eure Geschenke nicht, Ruoldo."

languages.text: [Rendre le cadeau] « Solomorne, prenez bonne note de cette tentative de corruption. Quant à vous, Ruoldo, sachez que je me passe allègrement de vos cadeaux. »
languages.original_text: [Return the gift] "Solomorne, make a note of this attempted bribery. I have no need of your gifts, Ruoldo."

traits.locale_text: [Rendre le cadeau] « Solomorne, prenez bonne note de cette tentative de corruption. Quant à vous, Ruoldo, sachez que je me passe allègrement de vos cadeaux. »

languages.text: [退还礼物]“索罗蒙，记下来总督企图贿赂的行为。我不需要你的礼物，罗尔多。”
languages.original_text: [Return the gift] "Solomorne, make a note of this attempted bribery. I have no need of your gifts, Ruoldo."

traits.locale_text: [退还礼物]“索罗蒙，记下来总督企图贿赂的行为。我不需要你的礼物，罗尔多。”

languages.text: [Devolver el regalo] «Solomorne, tome nota de este intento de soborno. No necesito sus regalos, Ruoldo».
languages.original_text: [Return the gift] "Solomorne, make a note of this attempted bribery. I have no need of your gifts, Ruoldo."

traits.locale_text: [Devolver el regalo] «Solomorne, tome nota de este intento de soborno. No necesito sus regalos, Ruoldo».

languages.text: [プレゼントを返す]「ソロモーン、この賄賂未遂の件を記録しておけ。{mf|俺|私}には君のプレゼントなど必要ない、ルオルド」
languages.original_text: [Return the gift] "Solomorne, make a note of this attempted bribery. I have no need of your gifts, Ruoldo."

traits.locale_text: [プレゼントを返す]「ソロモーン、この賄賂未遂の件を記録しておけ。{mf|俺|私}には君のプレゼントなど必要ない、ルオルド」

languages.text: [Armağanı reddet] "Bu rüşvet girişimini not al Solomorne. Senin hediyelerine ihtiyacım yok Ruoldo."
languages.original_text: [Return the gift] "Solomorne, make a note of this attempted bribery. I have no need of your gifts, Ruoldo."
